item.title: CoreWeave and Nebius shares rebound. Were debt fears too extreme?
item.description: Micron’s earnings report is lifting AI stocks in general, but a Seaport analyst wondered if investors were reacting too severely to debt concerns.

item.title: Micron just had its Nvidia moment. What comes next for the stock?
item.description: Micron’s dramatic beat has analysts feeling upbeat about the company’s ability to be a huge beneficiary of the AI boom.

item.title: We’re in our 60s. Should I collect Social Security now to help my wife? What if I die before her?
item.description: “What happens to her if I die before starting to collect my Social Security benefits?”

item.title: Gen Z would rather cut Social Security benefits for current retirees than pay higher taxes to save the program
item.description: There’s a stark generational divide in how to solve the Social Security crisis.

item.title: Why Trump Media is getting into the nuclear business with $6 billion TAE deal
item.description: Trump Media’s stock is soaring as the Truth Social operator looks to get in on a hot AI power trend.
